column1: Q: Why does the US wear a tie? A: To cover up the traces of socialism strangling it.
Q: Why do Soviet-made vacuums work better in the US? A: Because they were designed to pick up dirt on foreign soil.
Q: Why are the all Western products so expensive in our country? A: It's not that they are expensive, it just that they are available.
Q: Why than the US has a "Pepsi-generation" but we don't? A: Because we couldn't survive two shortages at the same time.
Q: Is it true that in US you can say whatever you want about their government? A: Absolutely true, and even more, you can also freely express any thoughts about our Soviet government.
